name: coffee boy
description:
in this charming short game, you play as the newly-hired coffee boy. it's up to you to find the True Coffee and deliver it to Boss! you'll get to make wacky friends, explore the mysterious facility, read hilarious flavor text, and ... find the missing coffee boy? anyways, don't mind that last thing, and focus on GETTING THE COFFEE TO BOSS!

there are two endings possible!! see if you can find them both :)

made for the inspirejam 2022 (i started and finished a few weeks early) 

inspired by: 

  • my own love for coffee
  • the backrooms (inspired the setting somewhat)
  • rpg-style absurd comedy in general (specifically portal, undertale, and furquest)

tools / assets: 

  • bitsy by adam le doux
  • palettsy by zenzoa
  • "smashing windshields" from freddy fazbear's pizzeria simulator by leon riskin

feedback is always appreciated!! ratings and comments really motivate me to keep creating and improving ^_^ <3 let me know what you think - about the settings, the story, the characters, the flavor text, the endings, anything and everything!!

donations of $1 or more get a complimentary download of an art piece that i drew for the game!!
